about_the_game:
NOTHING MATTERS.

You awaken in your New York apartment the morning after Halloween. The city outside is silent, and your memories of last night are a blur. The remnants of a celebration surround you, but something is off. Doors that should open are locked. Shadows seem to move on their own. Whispers echo from empty rooms.

Nothing matters—or so it seems as reality unravels around you.

Explore your home and piece together fragments of your lost memories. Each discovery pulls you deeper into a reality where the familiar becomes distorted, and the truth hides behind a veil of uncertainty. What happened last night? Do you really want to know?

Add to Wishlist now to help the development of Project ER

Features


  • Deep Narrative
  • Open Exploration
  • Nightmarish Atmosphere
  • Adaptive Puzzles
  • Thought-Provoking Story
  • Haunting Soundtrack
  • Advanced Physics
  • New Revelations



    Note: Project ER is a standalone experience that serves as a gateway into a larger, untold story. Your journey begins here.

name: SINFELD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.80GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 Video card with 512MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas ilícitas
Sexo Explícito
Violência Extrema

short_description: SINFELD is a surreal horror experience blending action, mystery, and dark humor in a twisted, reality-bending world. Inspired by Resident Evil and Silent Hill, it takes players on a disturbing, darkly funny journey through familiar but unsettling environments. Crafted by a small indie dev team.
